text:
@CNN @CNN @NYGovCuomo
 A president unfit for a pandemic. The blood is on Trump's hands. These headlines have been written ad nauseum by you  & other media corps, so let's give credit where credit is due, right? To date, 16k+ Covid-19 deaths in NYC #bloodisonyourhandscuomo #unfitforgov
